title: Someone help please!

embed.description: This category contains all voice-overs related to Katarina, the Sinister Blade.

body: I'm trying to download katarina voice quote for twitch follow alert sound, but when i start downloading it, then it changes it to ogx file?! The site says "Ogg" but it downloads "Ogx" for me. Does anyone how to fix this? + Ik there's this site http://audio.online-convert.com/convert-to-ogg but it just sends an error message for me...

replies.body: Yeah it looks like it's saving as a different type of file.  That site is third party, though, so we don't have any jurisdiction over it.  You'll want to reach out to them and let them know.  In the meantime, it may try asking the community over at the [Sound Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art).  They might be able to find some resources for you!
